drupalNodeEvent.title: Sunflowers and Umbrellas: Social Movements, Expressive Practices and Political Culture in Taiwan and Hong Kong

field_speakers.processed: Thomas Gold (Sociology, UC Berkeley), Sebastian Veg (School of Advanced Studies in Social Sciences (EHESS) - Paris)

field_description.processed: Co-Editors Thomas Gold (UC Berkeley) and Sebastian Veg (School of Advanced Social Sciences, Paris) engage in conversation with authors of chapters from this volume based on a conference held at Berkeley in 2018.
